img_des: A dynamic web application that showcases a software companys services, portfolio, and client testimonials. Includes sections for team introduction, contact form, and project inquiry. Built using modern front-end technologies and responsive design principles.

A web-based music player that allows users to play, pause, and skip audio tracks. Features playlist management, volume control, and real-time track progress display. Utilizes HTML5 audio API with a user-friendly interface.

An interactive web calculator for performing basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Designed with responsive layout and real-time result display. Uses JavaScript for functional logic and instant computation.

A responsive web gallery that displays images in grid and slideshow formats. Supports image preview, filtering, and lightbox effects for enhanced viewing. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with smooth animations.
